Title: Love Unending
Description:
Alongside a proper conduit to house Tarecgosa's soul during the ritual, we need enough magical essence to ground the flower. The bronze dragonflight was involved in creating the staff you hold, so I believe it best we use their magic again.

Some of the sand within the Temporal Conflux should suit this purpose perfectly. Just make sure it's of the more magical variety.
ObjectivesText: Gather Ephemeral Sand from the Temporal Conflux.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Kalecgos at the Veiled Ossuary.
